price: 39. Mpe bokofutama sé kolandana na maye bozalaki kosala.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
